Question.Subject: Help!! Why won't the......................?
Question.Content:
Little button ON AIM EXPRESS that says "edit" (where you can put your picture) actually work!? Every time I press the stupid thing, it doesn't open up a new window that says "take a picture with webcam' or "upload from your computer" or something. Its like the link to that button is broken... And it works on other computers! WHY??? help me. thank you !
xoxo Haydee
Question.ChosenAnswer: Check if your antivirus or security settings are blocking any pop ups. Reinstall aim

Answer.Content: Check if your antivirus or security settings are blocking any pop ups. Reinstall aim
1.It could be a java error try updating your java http://java.com/en/ 2.could be your browser wont support it try other browsers hope this helps
Answer.Reference: its happened to me with various apps
